CustomField.description: Number of times the work order was assigned bucket. This is used for reporting purpose.
CustomField.formula: IF ( SVMXC__NoOfTimesAssigned__c <=2, "Less Than 2 Times", IF ( SVMXC__NoOfTimesAssigned__c <= 6, "2 To 6 Times", IF ( SVMXC__NoOfTimesAssigned__c <= 10, "6 to 10 Times", "Over 10 Times")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of times the work order was assigned bucket. This is used for reporting purpose.
CustomField.label: Number Of Times Assigned Bucket
